name: adc-microservices-root
description: Root package for ADC Microservices Architecture

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd api-gateway && npm install && cd ../api-billing && npm install && cd ../api-inventory && npm install && cd ../api-prescription && npm install
scripts.build:all: cd api-gateway && npm run build && cd ../api-billing && npm run build && cd ../api-inventory && npm run build && cd ../api-prescription && npm run build
scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start:gateway" "npm run start:billing" "npm run start:inventory" "npm run start:prescription"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:billing" "npm run dev:inventory" "npm run dev:prescription"
scripts.test:all: cd api-gateway && npm test && cd ../api-billing && npm test && cd ../api-inventory && npm test && cd ../api-prescription && npm test
